palette.title: Naginami
palette.description:
This palette alone can't do justice to the work of Apricot. While so many works of manga style art blend in with one another, hers stand out with their marriage of antique European and Japanese fashions, their clutter, their sense of wonder, their sheer hints of the sinister, and--most of all--their unusual and unique color scheme.
I may have to make more palettes to capture the full range of Apricot's concepts of color.
The Nagi and Nami series by the artist Apricot. The specific work this palette is derived from is the introduction to the Nagi and Nami characters called "Gate."
